colorconfig.title: Color configuration
colorconfig.description: Here you can configure the color and behaviour of the LED clock hands.

time.title: Time configuration
time.description: Here you can configure the time settings.

date.title: Date configuration
date.description: Here you can setup the clock hands.

alarm.description: It's possible to set an alarm.

colorconfig.fluidmotion: Flowing motion for the second hand.

timeconfig.title: Time configuration
timeconfig.description: Here you can configure the time settings.

alarm.title: Alarm
alarm.description: If you enable the alarm function a red ring will be shown at the given time.

timeconfig.hourlight: Show a rainbow on top of the hour.

sysconfig.title: System configuration
sysconfig.description: Here you can configure global system settings.

ledorder.title: LED ordering
ledorder.description: You can define a custom position on the LED strip for the weekday, date and month. The time is always fixed to the first 60 LEDs.

firmware.title: Firmware update
firmware.description: Update the firmware of the clock by selecting an update file and click 'Start update'. After about a minute the clock should be updated.

reset.title: Reset the clock
reset.description: This resets all settings. You'll have to reconnect to the WiFi provided by the clock and reconfigure the clock.
